activities: Partnership Travel Consulting consolidates expense and purchasing data for its corporate customers throughout the world, including EU countries.  Partnership Travel Consulting enters into contracts with its corporate customers whereby it acts as their agent for consolidation of data and the use of such data is governed by the written contracts and data is not used by Partnership Travel Consulting for any purpose not specified in the contracts.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: General Services - (GSV)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)Travel & Tourism Services - (TRA)
privacyprograms: None.  Use of protected data is governed exclusively by Partnership Travel Consulting contracts with corporate customers who supply or arrange for access to the data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorites and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
